description: Manage projects, tasks, and documents directly through a comprehensive suite of productivity tools. Search for tasks, generate status reports, and track time entries across entire workspaces. Access document hierarchies and member information to streamline collaboration and project oversight.

apiKey.description: ClickUp personal API token used for all API requests

teamId.description: ClickUp workspace ID applied when tool inputs omit one

readOnly.description: When true, all write operations are disabled. Takes precedence over other write settings.

charLimit.description: Maximum characters returned before responses are truncated

writeLists.description: List IDs where write operations are permitted

writeSpaces.description: Space IDs where write operations are permitted

selectiveWrite.description: When true, write access is restricted to specific lists or spaces defined in writeLists and writeSpaces.

maxAttachmentMb.description: Largest file attachment (MB) allowed for uploads

reportingMaxTasks.description: Max tasks to fetch for reports

spaceConfigCacheTtlMs.description: Space config cache TTL in milliseconds

capabilities.name: ping
capabilities.description: Echo request for connectivity checks.

capabilities.name: health
capabilities.description: Report server readiness and enforced safety limits.

capabilities.name: tool_catalogue
capabilities.description: Enumerate all available tools with their annotations.

capabilities.name: workspace_capability_snapshot
capabilities.description: Expose cached ClickUp capability probes for this session.

capabilities.name: workspace_list
capabilities.description: List accessible ClickUp workspaces (teams). Use when you need workspace IDs before exploring spaces.

capabilities.name: space_list_for_workspace
capabilities.description: List spaces for a workspace by workspaceId. Use search when you only know workspace names.

capabilities.name: folder_list_for_space
capabilities.description: List folders within a ClickUp space. Use when you already know spaceId.

capabilities.name: list_list_for_space_or_folder
capabilities.description: List lists inside a space or folder by ID. If you only know names, resolve them first with resolve_path_to_ids.

capabilities.name: workspace_overview
capabilities.description: Summarise workspace metrics and recent spaces/folders/lists when you have a workspaceId.

capabilities.name: workspace_hierarchy
capabilities.description: Fetch nested hierarchy (spaces, folders, lists) for one or more workspaces. Use this to browse structure without task data.

capabilities.name: hierarchy_resolve_path
capabilities.description: Resolve workspace/space/folder/list names into IDs. Use before tools that require IDs.

capabilities.name: member_list_for_workspace
capabilities.description: List members in a workspace by teamId. Use when you already know the workspaceId.

capabilities.name: member_resolve
capabilities.description: Resolve member identifiers (id, email, username) into member records for a workspace.

capabilities.name: member_search_by_name
capabilities.description: Fuzzy search member names to find member IDs.

capabilities.name: task_assignee_resolve
capabilities.description: Translate assignee references into suggested member IDs for tasks.

capabilities.name: space_tag_list
capabilities.description: List tags configured for a space using spaceId.

capabilities.name: reference_link_list
capabilities.description: List public ClickUp API reference links.

capabilities.name: reference_page_fetch
capabilities.description: Fetch a public ClickUp API reference page from a link returned by reference_link_list.

capabilities.name: task_search
capabilities.description: Structured task search with filters. Use when you have listIds/tagIds; returns tasks across lists.

capabilities.name: task_search_fuzzy
capabilities.description: Fuzzy task search from natural language when you do not have precise filters.

capabilities.name: task_search_fuzzy_bulk
capabilities.description: Batch fuzzy task searches for multiple natural language prompts.

capabilities.name: task_status_report
capabilities.description: Summarise task status and priority for a workspace, space, folder or list without returning full task lists.

capabilities.name: task_risk_report
capabilities.description: Summarise overdue and at-risk tasks within a workspace, space, folder or list. Subtasks are included by default; use includeSubtasks to focus on parent tasks and inspect isSubtask/parentId in results to understand hierarchy.

capabilities.name: task_read
capabilities.description: Fetch task details including createdDate/updatedDate fields derived from ClickUp timestamps. Subtask cues (isSubtask, parentId, hasSubtasks, subtaskCount) are included; check them before claiming there are no subtasks. GET /task/{task_id}

capabilities.name: task_list_for_list
capabilities.description: List tasks in a list. Tasks linked from other lists are included by default (include_timl=true). Outputs include createdDate derived from ClickUp date_created and hierarchy cues (isSubtask, parentId, hasSubtasks, subtaskCount). Always review hasSubtasks/subtaskCount before asserting there are no subtasks. Results are paginated and may span multiple pages; iterate via the page input to retrieve additional pages. GET /list/{list_id}/task

capabilities.name: task_comment_list
capabilities.description: Retrieve task comments for a taskId.

capabilities.name: list_custom_field_list
capabilities.description: List custom fields configured for a list by listId.

capabilities.name: doc_list
capabilities.description: List documents within a workspace using filters.

capabilities.name: doc_read
capabilities.description: Fetch document metadata and pages for a docId.

capabilities.name: doc_pages_read
capabilities.description: Fetch selected document pages by docId and pageIds.

capabilities.name: doc_page_list
capabilities.description: List page hierarchy for a document by docId.

capabilities.name: doc_page_read
capabilities.description: Fetch a single document page by docId and pageId.

capabilities.name: doc_search
capabilities.description: Search document content across a workspace. Use doc_page_read for specific pages.

capabilities.name: doc_search_bulk
capabilities.description: Batch document searches when you need several queries processed together.

capabilities.name: task_time_entry_list
capabilities.description: Fetch time entries for a taskId, including total duration.

capabilities.name: time_entry_current
capabilities.description: Retrieve the current running timer for the workspace.

capabilities.name: time_entry_list
capabilities.description: List time entries with filters. Accepts ISO 8601 or epoch boundaries; include taskId when focusing on a single task.

capabilities.name: time_report_for_tag
capabilities.description: Aggregate logged time for a tag across the workspace. Use space_tag_list to discover tags, and includeSubtasks to control whether child task time is counted.

capabilities.name: time_report_for_container
capabilities.description: Aggregate time for a workspace, space, folder or list using containerId + containerType. Resolve IDs with resolve_path_to_ids, list_workspaces/spaces/folders/lists, and set includeSubtasks to clarify hierarchy handling.

capabilities.name: time_report_for_context
capabilities.description: Aggregate time for a task, list (including filtered views), space or workspace. Use search_tasks or task_list_for_list to source listId/taskId before calling. Subtask handling is explicit via includeSubtasks.

capabilities.name: time_report_for_space_tag
capabilities.description: Aggregate time for a tag within a space using spaceId. Use space_tag_list to pick the tag and includeSubtasks to control hierarchy.
